short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful launch tool to search your favourite search engines with powerful built-in AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shortkey is a revolutionary way to navigate the internet. Set your own keys to quickly access frequently visited sites and perform search operations. 

You can assign multiple keywords to each key, ensuring you never forget which ones you’re using. Additionally, Shortkey offers a variety of tools to help you interact efficiently, such as an integrated calculator and a password generator. These features, along with many other small but useful tools, provide a significantly enhanced user experience. 

You can still use your favorite search engine, as Shortkey is not a search engine itself. Instead, it allows you to interact more quickly by opening your desired pages with custom commands before using your search engine. The integrated AI feature also supports custom requests—you define what the AI should do, and it all happens automatically, just by using your own keywords.
